news_header: All passengers and crew survived a flight crash at Toronto Pearson Airport, with only minor injuries reported. The Delta Air Lines flight from Minneapolis overturned while landing, resulting in critical injuries to one child and two adults.
news_original_title: All passengers and crew survive plane crash at Toronto airport
news_text: Emergency services responded quickly, and the airport resumed operations later that day despite some delays. Investigations are ongoing regarding the crash, which occurred amid adverse weather conditions.
